label: KnowledgeBaseRemoteSharePointReference
description: Represents a remote SharePoint document reference.

fields.label: Activity Source
fields.tooltip: The source activity ID for the reference.

fields.label: Web URL
fields.tooltip: The url the reference data originated from.

fields.label: Reranker Score
fields.tooltip: The reranker score for the document reference.

fields.label: Sensitivity Label Info
fields.tooltip: Information about the sensitivity label applied to the SharePoint document.

fields.label: Source Data
fields.tooltip: The source data for the reference.
